channel.title: AMG! Mah fractalz
channel.description:
Sorry for the disruptive title if its that bad XD. Well anyways, I thought it was time for me to post atleast [i]something[/i] of what I did with Apophysis, so here it is. I compiled the 90 fractals I had made in roughly 1 year - 1.5 years into one album. Please rate them, and keep in mind that some are incredible, some completely suck, and some may possibly leave you in tears :D Rate them somehow I guess, and just tell me what you think :)
http://profile.imageshack.us/user/ddsp11/images
Enjoy :D And if [b][i][u]ANYONE[/u][/i][/b] decides to incorporate these into a graphic, ask for permission first and add some sort of credits somewhere near or in the graphic itself :)

item.title: AMG! Mah fractalz
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Dem some good fractals. And my older sister used one of my fractals for a business card actually XD

Read full topic

item.title: AMG! Mah fractalz
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

goatee:

Just because they don’t know how to do it doesn’t mean it looks good or is a good technique. I’m not trying to criticize you I just see this practise as pointless.

http://abduzeedo.com/inspiration-fractal-art-mistywips

Read full topic

item.title: AMG! Mah fractalz
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Its not pointless, but that’s your opinion entirely. Many people do find these incredible, but despite having over 1 and a half year’s experience, I’m still a beginner. I’d tell you a website which has MANY fractals made by others which are much better than mine, but i think it would count as advertising >.<
And I do see where you think that they are pointless. They are too abstract to really be used in anything, but could only occasionally be used in images such as sigs or avatars. But aside from that, they make pretty shmexy computer backgrounds ;).

Read full topic

item.title: AMG! Mah fractalz
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Just because they don’t know how to do it doesn’t mean it looks good or is a good technique. I’m not trying to criticize you I just see this practise as pointless.

item.title: AMG! Mah fractalz
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Pretty much, but many people don’t have the slightest clue on how to make them though. In all seriousness, if I showed the fractals I made to most of my friends, they’d be wondering how the fuck I did it since they don’t even know the program for it

Read full topic

item.title: AMG! Mah fractalz
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I don’t see the point in fractals… you are just generating an image from some numbers aren’t you?

Read full topic

item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

It says that I cannot join at this time. Besides, I don’t want to clutter up a thread with 90 different links. But seeing as the album gives a 504 error <.<…I’m just going to put up a link to all of my pics. 6 of the fractals are my sister’s though, and you gotta scroll through pages.

Read full topic
